page.title: 07 HOME LIFE
page.content: A Day In The Life Of Mr.Sangani. MAY 21st.1985 07.00 Woken by radio alarm - BBC 4 News 07.15 Listen to radio before arising. 07.30 Prepare for work. Brush and wash. 07.45 Shave: come to life with enthusiasm 08.00 Tea drink. Off to work and school 08.15 Drop daughter off at school. 08.30 Arrive at office. Greet everyone 08.45 Decide the day's priorites. 09.00 Office progress weekly talk up-date session. Discuss affairs. 10.15 Talk business with colleagues on a 90 mile journey to another company. 12.00 Talk and take notes at the meeting.
